name: test_e2e_with_logs[145_XSS_DOM_016]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_016` |
| **Name** | Onclick event handler DOM XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `onclick=alert('DOM')`
- **Encoded**: `onclick%3Dalert%28%27DOM%27%29`

## Test Execution Results
